metadata.title: CVE-2023-25740 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
After downloading a Windows .scf script from the localfilesystem, an attacker could supply a remote path that would lead tounexpected network requests from the operating system. This also had thepotential to leak NTLM credentials to the resource.
*This bug onlyaffects Firefox for Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 110.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
